bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with chan hou zhong feng 產後中風 , wind stroke following delivery. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry biao jiao 鰾膠：燒存性，治婦人產難，產後風搐，破傷風 痙，止嘔血，散瘀血，消腫毒，伏硇砂 , “Burned by maintaining its nature it cures women with difficult delivery, wind with tic following delivery , and wind spasms in wounds. It stops vomiting of blood, disperses stagnant blood, dissolves the poison of swellings, and presses down nao sha ”.
